A4.text: The Five-star Red Flag was adopted as the national flag of China since the foundation of the People's Republic of China on 1 October 1949.

A5.text: The national flag of the People's Republic of China, also known as the Five-star Red Flag, is a Chinese red field with five golden stars charged at the canton.
